# GitHub Actions Status Badges

Add these badges to your README.md to show build status:

## Main CI/CD Pipeline
```markdown
[![CI/CD Pipeline](https://github.com/KingOfTheAce2/BEAR_AI/workflows/CI/CD%20Pipeline%20-%20BEAR%20AI%20Legal%20Assistant/badge.svg)](https://github.com/KingOfTheAce2/BEAR_AI/actions/workflows/ci-cd.yml)
```

## Custom Status Table
```markdown
| Workflow | Status | Description |
|----------|--------|-------------|
| CI/CD Pipeline | ![CI/CD](https://github.com/KingOfTheAce2/BEAR_AI/workflows/CI/CD%20Pipeline%20-%20BEAR%20AI%20Legal%20Assistant/badge.svg) | Cross-platform builds and testing |
| Pull Request | ![PR](https://github.com/KingOfTheAce2/BEAR_AI/workflows/Pull%20Request%20Validation/badge.svg) | PR validation and checks |
| Security | ![Security](https://github.com/KingOfTheAce2/BEAR_AI/workflows/Security%20Audit/badge.svg) | Daily security scanning |
| Documentation | ![Docs](https://github.com/KingOfTheAce2/BEAR_AI/workflows/Deploy%20Documentation/badge.svg) | Documentation deployment |
```
